---
id: send-agent-instance-llm
title: "SendAgentInstanceLLM"
description: "This interface can be used to, as the user, actively call the LLM service, and based on the response content of the LLM, actively call the TTS service as the AI agent, and send voice messages to the user.Please refer to [AI proactively speaking: proactive invocation of LLM and TTS](./../../guides/proactive-invocation-of-llm-and-tts.mdx) for details and examples."
api: 
info_path: core_products/aiagent/en/server/api-reference/agent-instance-control/open-api-desc
---

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>SendAgentInstanceLLM</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/"}></MethodEndpoint>


This interface can be used to, as the user, actively call the LLM service, and based on the response content of the LLM, actively call the TTS service as the AI agent, and send voice messages to the user.Please refer to [AI proactively speaking: proactive invocation of LLM and TTS](./../../guides/proactive-invocation-of-llm-and-tts.mdx) for details and examples.
## Request
